sentences: Catalina Berroa Ojea (28 February 1849 â€“ 23 November 1911) was a Cuban pianist, music teacher and composer.
Catalina Berroa was born in Trinidad, Las Villas, and studied with local teachers to master several instruments.
She operated a music academy in Trinidad where she taught students including her nephew, pianist and composer Lico Jimenez.
Song, Song of Belisa and Josefa, 1902
Vocal Recital: Provedo, Lucy - PALAU, R.L./SANCHEZ, J.P./DE BLANCK, H./ANCKERMANN, C./AGUERO, G./JIMENEZ, J.M. (La Perla) Colibri CD-091
